MatchedRegions.transcript: handband takes input the structure of protein and structure of ligands and divides the protein into pockets, functional blocks, and models their interaction with the ligand through trigonometric distance maps.

MatchedRegion.Text: Block Distance Maps DP Segmentation GNN h Interaction Map Prediction Contrastive Protein Functional Blocks Prioritization Generation Loss Interaction Matrix Z Binding Affinity 3D Initialization GNN Trigonometry-aware Prediction h Message Updating CH2 Ligand Distance Map Dc Drug Ligand Conformer

MatchedRegions.transcript: And we also build a contrastive loss to prioritize the native blocks.
